EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_Any Workload Any Cloud_Q418.Invite 3 - AU
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Pivotal Meetups and Webinars
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
At Pivotal, we are committed to transforming how the world builds and runs software. To learn how you can make transformation real for your organisation, I thought you might be interested in the upcoming events:
*Meetups - Cloud Foundry as a PaaS, CaaS and FaaS*
Here we'll discuss how Cloud Foundry - the Open Source Multi Cloud Platform helps enterprises run all the application abstractions with one underlying software. We'll also look at an application which has parts of it's services running on PaaS, CaaS and FaaS and how it all fits together on Cloud Foundry.
Melbourne 27th November 2018 5:30pm - 7:45pm YBF Ventures REGISTER: https://www.meetup.com/Cloud-Native-Melbourne-Meetup/events/255734521
Sydney 28th November 2018 5:30pm - 7:45pm Pivotal Labs REGISTER: https://www.meetup.com/Cloud_Native_Sydney_Meetup/events/255734407
*Live Webinar - Any Workload Any Cloud*
With all the hype about moving to the cloud, the reality is that a large percentage of enterprise workloads still run on-premises due to technical complexity, data privacy, and security concerns. So how do you future-proof your business by introducing layers of abstraction that allow you to run any workload on any cloud?
4th December 2018 1:30PM AEDT (1 hour) REGISTER: https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14883/340843
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
